mapper.select: SELECT A.CODE,A.CODE_NM, A.DEPTH, A.GR_CODE , IF ( A.DEPTH >= 1, SUBSTR(A.CODE, 1, 2), '') AS DP1_CODE , SI_DO_NM AS DP1_CDNM , IF ( A.DEPTH >= 2, SUBSTR(A.CODE, 1, 5), '') AS DP2_CODE , SI_GUN_GU_NM AS DP2_CDNM , IF ( A.DEPTH >= 3, SUBSTR(A.CODE, 1, 8), '') AS DP3_CODE , LEGAL_UEP_MYUN_DONG_NM AS DP3_CDNM FROM TB_AD003 a WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEPTH IN ( 1, 2, 3 ) AND A.GR_CODE = IFNULL(#{grCode}, '')
